options.content:
DNS Metrics are not enabled in the Opentelemtry Collector by default
(due to the relatively large number of requests required to gather the data).


For data to populate in this dashboard, you need to enable them as follows (and then you might want
to delete this panel):

## Enable For All BigIPs
You can enable GTM metrics for all BigIPs by editing the
config/ast_defaults.yaml file in the AST directory and setting

```yaml
bigip_receiver_defaults:
...
  data_types:
...
    f5.dns:
      enabled: true
```

## Enable For Select BigIPs
You can enable DNS metrics for specific BigIPs by editing the
config/bigip_receivers.yaml file and setting the flag for the
specific devices you need:

```yaml
bigip/1:
  endpoint: https://10.0.0.1
  data_types:
    f5.dns:
      enabled: true
```

panels.title: DNS Resolver Cache Hit / Miss Rates
